http://dallas.about.com/gi/dynamic/offsite.htm?site=http://www.ci.dallas.tx.us/dpd/stat%5Fdecision.htm
 
 This site provides current crime statistics for the Dallas area. Does anyone know of a similar site for national statistics or world wide statistics?

Somewhere on the FBI site there are crime statistics, and I'm sure there are others. Try this one:
 
 
 http://www.fbi.gov/ucr/ucr.htm

The home ministry in the UK provides similar stats. Don't have a link handly but if you look up the UK's government page it will lead there. Had a lot of trouble finding info for France and Germany though.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Crime statistics!
